EmailTemplate.description: Email notification when a case has been approved
EmailTemplate.name: Case: DPT Case Approval
EmailTemplate.subject: DPT Case {!Case.CaseNumber} Has Been Approved.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Investigator: {!Case.OwnerFullName}
The Complaint that you recently investigated, {!Case.Id}, for {!Case.Account} has been approved.
